&SECTION1
CENTER=43           !<-Identification of Originating/Generating center (See commom code table C1 and C11 )
SUBCENTER=-99999999       !<-Sub-center of generating center (See common code C12)
/
! Note:  255 or -99999999   <- Missing value

!-------------------------
! Location identification 
!-------------------------
&STATION_ID
LATITUDE=-13.00583
LONGITUDE=-38.50583
WIGOS=0-76-0-2927408000W83229

HTEMP=1.5
HA= 47.4
SMC_TEMP=7

METHOD_TM=3
/

! *** Maximum temperature ***
&STIME_TX
HOUR=00
MINUTE=00
SECOND=01
DT=0
/

&STIME_TN

MINUTE=00
SECOND=01
DT=-1
/

SECOND=01

/

SECOND=01
DT=-1
/
